channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: U.S. House Foreign Affairs Committee Voices Support for Taiwan's President Lai
item.description: The head of the U.S. House Foreign Affairs Committee, Michael McCaul, has voiced his support for Taiwan’s new President Lai Ching-te. He was speaking at an event held by Taiwan’s r

item.title: President Lai Ching-te Meets With Former Lithuanian President
item.description: President Lai Ching-te met with former Lithuanian President Dalia Grybauskaite after his inauguration, and promised to continue building the friendship between the two countries.

item.title: China Conducts 'Joint Sword 2024A' Drills Around Taiwan After Lai's Inauguration
item.description: China has launched two days of military drills around Taiwan, calling it “punishment” for President Lai Ching-te's inauguration speech.

item.title: Police in Taiwan Capture Escaped Fugitive
item.description: Police in Taiwan have captured a fugitive who escaped from court-ordered psychiatric care, ending a four-day manhunt.
